data.actual_result: Message appears in recent mentions with reactions shown POSTED ON BEHALF OF <@83697112432246784>
data.expected_result: Message appears in recent mentions without reactions shown
data.short_description: Reactions settings not properly applied in recent mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Find or tell someone to post a message that mentions you- Go to User Settings > Text and Images, enable reactions- Put a reaction on it- Go to User Settings > Text and Images, disable reactions- Open recent mentions list and find the message
